title: My date of birth is 30 Jan 1991 ,time 7:15 AM (birth place: Hardoi, can anyone tell about my future? - Quora

response.answer_text: You are born in Capricorn Lagan. i.e. your birth lagan is Capricorn, and its lord is Saturn, placed in the lagan itself in its own sign forming auspicious Shasa Yoga but also afflicted by the conjunction of 8rth house lord enemy Sun and also afflicted by the conjunction of Rahu/Ketu axis. . Your Moon sign is Cancer. Your birth star (birth Nakshatra) is Pushya. Your Rashi Paya is copper and Nakshatra Paya Silver. The some important benefic auspicious Yogas in your horoscope are Shasha Mahapurush Yoga, Hamsa Yoga, GajaKesri Yoga and Harsha Vipreet Raja Yoga. Your horoscope also suffers from the following important inauspicious (malefic) Yoga which need to be taken care off. Surya Grahan yoga, Chandra Grahan, Shani Rahu Shrapit dosh yoga, Guru Chandal Yoga and Surya Shani Yoga. Presently you are running under the dasha of Venus and also antardasha of Venus. Venus in your horoscope is benefic Yoga karak Planet and is very beneficial, auspicious and favorable, hence presently you are running an auspicious and favorable period of time. Your career follows a mysterious checkered path, drawing money and support from surprising sources, and training you in unknown or esoteric procedures. Your position improves with time, although you may have to slog through some periods of restricted development. You may put in some of your best thinking and planning into your career. You may have an air of importance about you.
